## routeAndPathForCode

Returns a dictionary with route and params to be used by screenProps navigation

### Parameters

-   `screen` **[screen][3]** 
-   `code` **([object][4] | null)** 

Returns **[Promise][5]&lt;[object][4]>** {route, params}
